name: Kitty Climbing
description:
Play as a mythical cat-like creature climbing a tree in a fantasy world full of magical trees . Watch out for the evil dark crows who want to bring you back down to reality. Use pickups to regain health and speed passed the crows. On your way collect as many orbs as you an to help restore the power to the forest and rid the lands of the evil murder of crows. 

HOW TO PLAY:

Holding down the space bar to move, use the mouse to steer the kitty around the tree. 

Get the highest score you can.
